faq.title: Questions We Love to Answer
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating a song that touches hearts.
faq.contact_text: Have a question we haven't answered here? We'd love to hear from you.

questions.question: How personalized is the song, really?
questions.answer: Extremely. We don't use templates or generic lyrics. Every verse draws from your specific memories, inside jokes, and the unique qualities you share about the person. You'll receive something that could only exist because of your relationship.

questions.question: What's the turnaround time?
questions.answer: Our standard delivery is 7 days from when you complete your order. Need it sooner? Our rush service delivers within 24 hours, just look for the rush option during checkout.

questions.question: What if I'm not sure about the lyrics or style?
questions.answer: You'll review and approve the lyrics before we finalize the recording. We want it to be perfect for you. Our team will work with you on any adjustments until it feels just right.

questions.question: Can I get a rush order for a special occasion?
questions.answer: Absolutely. Select the rush option at checkout, and we'll prioritize your song for delivery within 24 hours. We understand that some moments can't wait.

questions.question: What music styles do you offer?
questions.answer: Choose from pop, rock, ballad, jazz, classical, or describe your own vision. Our musicians are versatile and will match the style to the emotion you want to convey.

questions.question: How is the song delivered?
questions.answer: You'll receive a high-quality digital download link via email, plus the option to add a beautifully designed digital greeting card. Rush orders are handled with extra care to meet your deadline.
